thread.title: Ground News - Ex-Rep. Katie Hill settles revenge-porn case against former husband
thread.title_full: Ground News - Ex-Rep. Katie Hill settles revenge-porn case against former husband

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Ex-Rep. Katie Hill settles revenge-porn case against former husband
text:
Summary by Ground News Hill sued her ex-spouse, Kenneth Heslep, and the news groups in December 2020. She alleged nude photos of her were published without her permission. The media defendants were previously dismissed on free-speech grounds. Hill was subsequently assessed thousands of dollars in attorneys' fees. Share menu More
